relation: The rec offers many great sports where you can make your own intramural team. There also a game room full of fun activities to do. There is always usually something going on at the university.
Great food choices! subway, dusty diner, home-made food, pizza, chicken tenders and burgers.
It may seem easy at first, but it can get tough so stay on track and study.

This university is a friendly environment and there is people to help you out with anything you need at any time. It makes you feel really comfortable and has a great atmosphere. I enjoy this university a lot.
pageTitle: Texas A & M International University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

Campus police is top of every rule. Keep an eye out for them they can be your best friend or foe. Greek Life Don't think this like the movies, the university is new to the Greek life so it is in its growing stage but they do have a lot of thing for its members.
